remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类在 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 应用程序中托管 Direct3D 内容。Use the class to host Direct3D content in a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) application. 调用方法以更改显示的 Direct3D 内容。 Call the method to change the Direct3D content displayed by the . 调用方法将 Direct3D surface 分配到。 Call the method to assign a Direct3D surface to a . 调用方法以跟踪 Direct3D surface 的更新。Call the method to track updates to the Direct3D surface. 调用方法以显示已更改的区域。Call the method to display the changed areas. 类管理两个显示缓冲区, 这些缓冲区称为*后台*缓冲区和*前台缓冲区。* The class manages two display buffers, which are called the *back buffer* and the *front buffer*. 后台缓冲区是 Direct3D surface。The back buffer is your Direct3D surface. 当你调用在硬件上显示的方法时, 对后台缓冲区的更改将被转发到前台缓冲区。Changes to the back buffer are copied forward to the front buffer when you call the method, where it is displayed on the hardware. 偶尔, 前台缓冲区变为不可用。Occasionally, the front buffer becomes unavailable. 此缺乏可用性的原因可能是屏幕锁定、全屏独占 Direct3D 应用程序、用户切换或其他系统活动。This lack of availability can be caused by screen locking, full-screen exclusive Direct3D applications, user-switching, or other system activities. 出现这种情况时, 将通过处理事件来通知您的 WPF 应用程序。When this occurs, your WPF application is notified by handling the event. 应用程序响应前台缓冲区变为不可用的方式取决于是否允许 WPF 回退到软件呈现。How your application responds to the front buffer becoming unavailable depends on whether WPF is enabled to fall back to software rendering. 方法具有一个重载, 该重载采用一个参数, 该参数指定 WPF 是否回退到软件呈现。The method has an overload that takes a parameter that specifies whether WPF falls back to software rendering. ## 在 WPF 不回退到软件呈现时响应不可用的前台缓冲区Responding to an Unavailable Front Buffer when WPF Does not Fall Back to Software Rendering 当调用重载或调用重载`enableSoftwareFallback` , 并将参数设置为`false`时, 呈现系统将在前台缓冲区变为不可用且没有任何内容时释放对后台缓冲区的引用会.When you call the overload or call the overload with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `false`, the rendering system releases its reference to the back buffer when the front buffer becomes unavailable and nothing is displayed. 当前台缓冲区再次可用时, 呈现系统将引发事件来通知您的 WPF 应用程序。When the front buffer is available again, the rendering system raises the event to notify your WPF application. 您可以为事件创建一个事件处理程序, 以便使用有效的 Direct3D surface 再次重新开始呈现。You can create an event handler for the event to restart rendering again with a valid Direct3D surface. 若要重新启动呈现, 必须调用。To restart rendering, you must call . ## 当 WPF 回退到软件呈现时响应不可用的前台缓冲区Responding to an Unavailable Front Buffer when WPF Falls Back to Software Rendering 当调用重载`enableSoftwareFallback`且参数设置为`true`时, 呈现系统将在前台缓冲区变为不可用时保留对后台缓冲区的引用 , 因此, 无需在前台缓冲区再次可用。When you call the overload with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `true`, the rendering system retains its reference to the back buffer when the front buffer becomes unavailable, so there is no need to call when the front buffer is available again. 可能存在用户的设备不可用的情况。There may be situations where the user's device becomes unavailable. 发生这种情况时 , 调用以释放 WPF 对后台缓冲区的引用。When that occurs, call to release WPF's reference to the back buffer. 如果需要重置设备, 请在`backBuffer`参数设置为`null`的情况下调用, 然后再次 `backBuffer`调用, 并将设置为有效的 Direct3D 图面。If you need to reset your device, call with the `backBuffer` parameter set to `null`, and then call again with `backBuffer` set to a valid Direct3D surface. > [!NOTE] > 性能很大程度上取决于 Direct3D surface 的设置。Performance depends greatly on the settings of the Direct3D surface. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[Direct3D9 和 WPF 互操作性的性能注意事项](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/performance-considerations-for-direct3d9-and-wpf-interoperability.md)。For more information, see [Performance Considerations for Direct3D9 and WPF Interoperability](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/performance-considerations-for-direct3d9-and-wpf-interoperability.md). > [!NOTE] > WPF 在软件中呈现时, `true` `enableSoftwareFallback` 类不会显示Direct3D内容,例如通过远程桌面连接时,除非你调用并为参数指定。The class does not display Direct3D content when WPF renders in software, such as over a Remote Desktop connection, unless you call and specify `true` for the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter. ## `D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8` 或 `D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8``D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8` or `D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8` - `D3DUSAGE_RENDERTARGET` - `D3DPOOL_DEFAULT` 仅允许在表面`IDirect3DSurface9Ex`上使用多级多级。Multisampling is allowed on `IDirect3DSurface9Ex` surfaces only. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法来分配 Direct3D surface。The following code example shows how to call the method to assign a Direct3D surface. 有关详细信息，请参见[演练：在 WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)中承载 Direct3D9 内容。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 当的锁定计数达到零时 , 将完全解除锁定。When the lock count for the reaches zero, the is fully unlocked. 如果图像已更改由先前对方法的调用指定的区域, 则将标记为呈现。 The is marked for rendering if the image has changed areas that were specified by previous calls to the method. 当提交更改并发生呈现时, 将对方法块进行其他调用, 直到呈现线程将后台缓冲区的内容复制到前台缓冲区。When the changes are committed and rendering occurs, additional calls to the method block until the render thread has copied the contents of the back buffer to the front buffer. 此同步避免显示项目, 如撕裂。This synchronization avoids display artifacts, such as tearing. > [!NOTE] > 在解锁时不更新 Direct3D surface。Do not update the Direct3D surface while the is unlocked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法将更新后的缓冲区复制到前台缓冲区。The following code example shows how to call the method to copy the updated back buffer to the front buffer. 有关详细信息，请参见[演练：在 WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)中承载 Direct3D9 内容。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md).
